raw_comment:
What do you notice?
I notice a graph shown about diversity in the athletic field. It shows a percentile of how many players and coaches are a different race than white. 
What do you Wonder?
I wonder if the other races either than white are more popular to play in the athletic field.
What impact does this have on you and your community?
This has a quite of a big impact due to the fact that the white race originated the sports around the world. It shows that a lot of people from different countries can also compete as an athlete in any sports.
What's going on in this graph? Write a catchy title for this graph.
It shows that in the professional athletic field they are  more players and coaches of color than any other race. 
The catchy title I would give to this specific graph is Diversity In The Professional Athletic Field.
ace_sentences: I notice a graph about diversity in the athletic field.
The percentile is the percentile of players who are a different race than white.
The percentile is the percentile of coaches who are a different race than white.
I wonder if races other than white are more popular in the athletic field.
This graph has a big impact on me and my community.
The white race originated sports around the world.
The graph shows that many people from different countries can compete as athletes in any sport.
The graph shows that in the professional athletic field there are more players of color than players of any other race.
The graph shows that in the professional athletic field there are more coaches of color than coaches of any other race.
The title of the graph is "Diversity in the Professional Athletic Field".
